scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules dist tmp && npm cache clean
scripts.prepare-electron: mkdirp ./tmp/web && ncp buildAssets/desktop tmp && ncp dist/web tmp/web
scripts.package-desktop: npm run prepare-electron && electron-packager ./tmp/ --all --asar --electron-version=1.7.9 --icon="buildAssets/resources/icon" --out=./dist/desktop/ && rimraf tmp
scripts.build-desktop: npm run build && npm run package-desktop
scripts.build-desktop-macos: npm run build && npm run package-desktop-macos
scripts.prod-desktop: npm run prod && npm run package-desktop
scripts.prepare-mobile: mkdirp dist/mobile/www && ncp dist/web dist/mobile/www && ncp buildAssets/mobile dist/mobile
scripts.package-mobile: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.package-mobile-ios: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare ios && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.package-mobile-android: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare android && mv ./google-services.json platforms/android && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.package-mobile-windows: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare windows && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.build-mobile: npm run build && npm run package-mobile
scripts.build-mobile-ios: npm run build && npm run package-mobile-ios
scripts.build-mobile-android: npm run build && npm run package-mobile-android
scripts.build-mobile-windows: npm run build && npm run package-mobile-windows
scripts.prod-mobile: npm run prod && npm run package-mobile
scripts.prod-mobile-ios: npm run prod && npm run package-mobile-ios
scripts.prod-mobile-android: npm run prod && npm run package-mobile-android
scripts.prod-mobile-windows: npm run prod && npm run package-mobile-windows
